001package org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.yaml;
002
003import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.StringBuilderOut;
004import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.TreeDumper;
005import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.render.Highlight;
006import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.render.RenderSpec;
007
008import java.io.PrintStream;
009import java.util.ArrayDeque;
010import java.util.Deque;
011import java.util.Iterator;
012import java.util.Map;
013import java.util.Objects;
014
015/**
016 * Implementation of {@link TreeDumper} that dumps into the passed {@link PrintStream}
017 * the tree of a {@link Highlight.Structure#YAML YAML} logical structure
018 * in {@link Highlight.Target#HTML_STYLE HTML} target format (HTML-CSS is coming soon).
019 */
020public class YamlHtmlDumper implements TreeDumper {
021
022    final PrintStream out;
023    final RenderSpec renderSpec;
024    final Deque<String> currentPath = new ArrayDeque<>();
025
026    int totalRowCount = 0;
027
028    public YamlHtmlDumper(PrintStream out, RenderSpec renderSpec) {
029        this.out = Objects.requireNonNull(out);
030        this.renderSpec = Objects.requireNonNull(renderSpec);
031    }
032
033    @Override
034    public void acceptRoot(Node rootNode) {
035        PrintStream innerOut = StringBuilderOut.create();
036        YamlHtmlDumper innerDumper = new YamlHtmlDumper(innerOut, renderSpec);
037        rootNode.visit(innerDumper);
038        out.println(renderSpec.dumpOuterHtml(innerOut.toString(), Highlight.Structure.YAML));
039    }
040
041    @Override
042    public void acceptNull() {
043        if (currentPath.isEmpty()) {
044            out.print(divRowStart());
045        }
046        if (parentIsMapping()) {
047            out.print(' ');
048        }
049        out.print(renderSpec.highlightNullHtmlStyle(Highlight.Structure.YAML));
050        if (currentPath.isEmpty()) {
051            out.print(divRowEnd());
052        }
053    }
054
055    @Override
056    public void acceptScalar(ScalarNode scalarNode) {
057        if (currentPath.isEmpty()) {
058            out.print(divRowStart());
059        }
060        if (parentIsMapping()) {
061            out.print(' ');
062        }
063        out.print(renderSpec.highlightValueHtmlStyle(Highlight.Structure.YAML, scalarNode.text()));
064        if (currentPath.isEmpty()) {
065            out.print(divRowEnd());
066        }
067    }
068
069    @Override
070    public void acceptSequence(SequenceNode sequenceNode) {
071        if (currentPath.isEmpty()) {
072            out.print(divRowStart());
073        }
074        int count = 0;
075        Iterator<Node> itNode = sequenceNode.sequenceItems().iterator();
076        while (itNode.hasNext()) {
077            if (count > 0 || parentIsMapping()) {
078                out.println(divRowEnd());
079                out.print(divRowStart());
080                out.print(indent());
081            }
082            out.print(dashSpace());
083            count++;
084            currentPath.addLast(String.format("[%d]", count));
085            itNode.next().visit(this);
086            currentPath.removeLast();
087        }
088        if (count == 0) {
089            out.print(emptySequence());
090        }
091        if (currentPath.isEmpty()) {
092            out.print(divRowEnd());
093        }
094    }
095
096    @Override
097    public void acceptMappings(MappingsNode mappingsNode) {
098        if (currentPath.isEmpty()) {
099            out.print(divRowStart());
100        }
101        int count = 0;
102        Iterator<Map.Entry<String, Node>> itEntry = mappingsNode.mappingsItems().iterator();
103        while (itEntry.hasNext()) {
104            if (count > 0 || parentIsMapping()) {
105                out.println(divRowEnd());
106                out.print(divRowStart());
107                out.print(indent());
108            }
109            count++;
110            Map.Entry<String, Node> entry = itEntry.next();
111            currentPath.addLast(String.format("(%s)", entry.getKey()));
112            out.print(renderSpec.highlightKeyHtmlStyle(Highlight.Structure.JSON, entry.getKey()));
113            out.print(colon());
114            entry.getValue().visit(this);
115            currentPath.removeLast();
116        }
117        if (count == 0) {
118            out.print(emptyMappings());
119        }
120        if (currentPath.isEmpty()) {
121            out.print(divRowEnd());
122        }
123    }
124
125    private boolean parentIsMapping() {
126        return !currentPath.isEmpty() && currentPath.getLast().endsWith(")");
127    }
128
129    private String divRowStart() {
130        return String.format("""
131            <div class="yaml-row yaml-row-%d" style="white-space: pre">""",
132            totalRowCount++
133        );
134    }
135
136    private String divRowEnd() {
137        return "</div>";
138    }
139
140    private String indent() {
141        return "  ".repeat(currentPath.size());
142    }
143
144    private String dashSpace() {
145        return renderSpec.highlightSyntaxHtmlStyle(Highlight.Structure.YAML, "- ");
146    }
147
148    private String colon() {
149        return renderSpec.highlightSyntaxHtmlStyle(Highlight.Structure.YAML, ':');
150    }
151
152    private String emptySequence() {
153        return renderSpec.highlightSyntaxHtmlStyle(Highlight.Structure.YAML, " []");
154    }
155
156    private String emptyMappings() {
157        return renderSpec.highlightSyntaxHtmlStyle(Highlight.Structure.YAML, " {}");
158    }
159}
